mapper.select: SELECT pm.ID ,pt.TICKETNO ,pm2.TITLE , ps.SCREENTIME ,ps2.SEAT ,pa.PRICE ,pa.AGE FROM P_MEMBER pm ,P_TICKET pt ,P_REVIEW pr ,P_MOVIE pm2 ,P_SCREENDATE ps ,P_SCREEN ps2 ,P_AGE pa WHERE pm.ID = pt.ID AND pt.ID = pr.ID AND pr.MID = pm2.MID AND ps.SCREENDATENO = pt.SCREENDATENO AND ps2.SCREENNO = pt.SCREENNO AND pt.AGE = pa.AGE AND pt.ID =#{id};
